Source.Name: hedgewars
Source.Description: Hedgewars is a turn based strategy game but the real buzz is from watching the devastation caused by those pesky hedgehogs with those fantastic weapons - sneaky little blighters with a bad attitude!.
Hedgewars, tur tabanlı bir strateji oyunu ama işin esas eğlencesi o sinir bozucu kirpilerin ellerindeki çeşit çeşit silahlarla yarattıkları yıkımı izlemekte.

Update.Comment: Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Speech Bubbles - during your turn, have your hedgehog express himself. In chat, use "regular speech" 'thought bubbles' -action bubbles- with the quote marks completely surrounding the entire typed text. You can also use /hsa /hta /hya to fire off a bubble at the moment of your attack. * New graves and hats. Animated stars in the frontend and a new theme. Add missing graphics and maps. * Two new taunts - a /shrug and /juggle -ing. * New mobster voice! A remake of the default voice set. New theme music. * New game modes. Karma, any injury you caused (not including drowning) is dealt to you too, unless invulnerable. Vampirism, where you feed off damage you deal, gaining 80% of it. Artillery, where your hog can not move about. * Options to control mine quantity and timer. Those are made use of in a Minefield scheme/weapon set as one of the default sets. * The sniper rifle demonstrated in previous news post. * Various fixes such as: prevent desync when a player quits, fix a crash at end of game in reduced quality, bug in synching changes to map and scheme in room, fix bug in disconnection from server, hedgehogs keep hats while jumping, bug in rope/parachute when drowning with active girder/teleport, bug in rope that on rare occasion deleted it on firing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Many many more terrain generation options, maps can be huge, very small, caverns, caves, stepping stones, etc. * To accompany these new terrain generation options there are new themes and musical tracks * On top of this there are a ton of brand new preset maps, have your hogs fight on city scapes and lazy old men in hammocks! * Lots of new hats (total of 79 now!) and to add to the hats, some new voice work * A new type of weapon called a utility has been added, these weapons drop in utiltiy crates and boost your hedgehogs abilities, low gravity, laser sight, extra time, extra damage, forcefield * Alongside weaponsets we now have "scheme sets", this means you can save gameplay options into a scheme for later use. We've also added a whole load more options for you to use in your schemes, you can add borders to any map, disable mines, enable low gravity, make all hogs invincible, and more. * The server has been given a major upgrade, you can now reserve your name with your hedgewars.org account. At the moment there are no stats in game, but we may already begin tracking them to display them later, so remember to log in! We are also integrating the game with the website. * A new Despeckling gameplay feature removes stray pixels from the terrain after fires/big explosions * Graphics updates, language updates, music and sound updates across the board * Demos can now be played without the frontend * Weapons and hogs can now bounce off of the water if they hit it at the right speed/angle.. this can be used in a very interesting way with the rope ;) * Hedgewars can now generate your team for you if you're feeling lazy, it also generates random teams for "quick play" mode, and even uses appropriate hats. I.e. it will generate a ninja team, with ninja names/hats! * Changed girder functionality completely to make it a much more interesting and fun weapon! * Many more fixes and feature.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Voicepacks, customize your teams voice! * Nice new visual statistics page after the match * Precise aiming, hold shift to aim more accurately * Improved lobby chat * Remote Control Plane weapon * A couple of additions to customization content (i.e. grave / fort / hat content) * Additional sound effects * Various tweaks and bug fixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Better menu icon * Massive number of network play bugfixes * Now spectating works for those who joined after game start * New Drill rocket weapon * New Napalm strike weapon * New Super awesome super weapon * Land can now be set to be indestructable * Six brand new maps using new themes * Lots of new forts * Hellish hand grenade reworked * Brand new lobby and lobby chat * Spread of Melon Bomb fragments improved * Blowtorch bug fixes and improvements * Fixed a crash bug that occured when the engine had no room to place all Hedgehogs * More delay after jump, less delay after small fall for hedgehog * Limit max chat message length to 300 characters * Ammo menu no longer closes when user clicks on not yet available weapon * Ammo scheme bug fixes * Fire effect improved
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Description: Comix is a user-friendly, customizable image viewer. It is specifically designed to handle comic books, but also serves as a generic viewer. It reads images in ZIP, RAR or tar archives (also gzip or bzip2 compressed) as well as plain images files. It is written in Python and uses GTK+ through the PyGTK bindings.

Comix kullanıcı dostu, özelleştirilebilir resim görüntüleyicisidir. Özellikle çizgi romanları görüntülemek için tasarlanmıştır; ama genel resim görüntüleyici olarak da kullanılabilir. Doğrudan resimleri açmanın yanında, ZIP, RAR veya tar arşivleri (bzip2 ya da gzip biçiminde sıkıştırılmış olanlar da dahil) içindeki resimleri de okuyabilir. Python'da yazılıp arayüzü PyGTK ile tasarlanmıştır.

It offers an easy way to add items using a dialog, and to move items accross different panels.

Source.Summary: Perl wrappers for the GLib utility and Object libraries
Source.Description: This module provides perl access to Glib and GLib's GObject libraries. Source.Name: geany
Source.Summary: Fast and lightweight programming tool using GTK+
GTK+ kullanan, hızlı ve hafif bir programlama aracı
Source.Description: Geany is a small C editor using GTK+ with basic features of an integrated development environment. It features syntax highlighting, code completion, call tips, many supported filetypes (including C, Java, PHP, HTML, DocBook, Perl, LateX, and Bash), and symbol lists.

Geany, bir bütünleşik geliştirme ortamında yer alan temel özellikleri içeren basit bir GTK+ arayüzlü programlama aracıdır. Kod renklendirme, kod tamamlama, çağrı tipleri gibi özellikleri desteklmekte; birçok dosya tiplerini (C, Java, PHP, HTML, DocBook, Perl, LateX, and Bash) ve sembol listelerini içermektedir.

Update.Comment: * Version bump. * Fix underlinking. * Purge unused direct dependencies.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Add missing dependency (#9260). Thanks to Ozan Çağlayan. * Added Icon and Description tag.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump, * Include I18N support instead of gi18n, * Update Scintilla to version 1.77, * Add net styles about some plugins.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: Remove temporary file (/usr/share/icons/hicolor/icon-theme.cache), it should not be installed because it conflicts other icon-theme.cache files from other packages.

Source.Name: poedit
Source.Summary: A cross-platform Gettext catalogs (.po files) editor
Source.Description: This program is GUI frontend to GNU Gettext utilities and catalogs editor/source code parser. It helps with translating application into another language. For details on principles of the solution used, see GNU Gettext documentation or wxWidgets' wxLocale class reference.

Poedit, GNU Gettext arayüzü ve katalog düzenleyicisi / kaynak kod ayrıştırıcısıdır. Uygulamaları başka dillere çevirmede yardımcı olur. Detaylı bilgi için GNU Gettext dökümantasyonu ya da wxWidgets wxLocale sınıf referanslarına göz atın.

Update.Comment: Add optimization and fix segfault error.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen
